synonyms.synonym: Nuclear receptor subfamily 2 group B member 1

protein.general_function: Involved in sequence-specific DNA binding transcription factor activity
protein.specific_function: Nuclear hormone receptor. Involved in the retinoic acid response pathway. Binds 9-cis retinoic acid (9C-RA). ARF6 acts as a key regulator of the tissue-specific adipocyte P2 (aP2) enhancer

go_class.description: sequence-specific dna binding transcription factor activity
